jd: Back End Developer • Sydney CBD • Large Fintech Organisation • Permanent Opportunities  About the role:  We are searching for a Python Engineer where you will be responsible for writing and testing code, debugging programs and integrating applications for a global organisation. The role will be responsible for designing and developing new APIs as well as adding features and enhancements to existing applications.  About you: • 3 + years Python Development experience • Experience working with other languages (C++, C#, Java) • Experience working with Python ORM frameworks (Peewee, Tortoise, Piccolo) • Experience with either Jinja2, Django, Mako etc • Experience building REST service using Python. FastAPI experience highly desirable • Cloud experience - AWS, Azure or GCP • Payments / Banking / Trading background highly desirable • Excellent verbal & written communication skills • PR or Citizen of Australia  If this position is of interest then click APPLY NOW with your up to date resume... for a confidential chat with our Software Engineering specialist Shannon.  Kapital Consulting is a boutique agency specialising in Fintech / BFSI IT Recruitment across Australia and AsiaPac. For more information on upcoming roles or market information visit our Linkedin page 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/kapital-consulting'
